skills.title: Mobile Development

After thorough testing, I published these apps on their respective app stores, reaching a wide audience of mobile users.

skills.title: Python Programming
skills.description: I specialize in Python development with expertise in data analysis, web scraping, web applications, and deep learning. My journey spans personal projects and university coursework, allowing me to create practical solutions and explore diverse domains.

portfolio.title: Turn & Slide (Puzzle Game)
portfolio.description: Created an online puzzle game in Unity (C#) that collects player statistics and stores them in a NoSQL cloud database. The stored data were used to train a machine learning algorithm in Python to recognize the cognitive style of a player, in order to find a way to adjust UX without human input.

portfolio.title: Little Lemon website (front-end)
portfolio.description: Set up the front-end portion of a restaurant's website using only fundamental React and React Router. Website includes a welcome screen leading to a functional table reservation widget. As part of a challenge, this project was done in 48 hours.

portfolio.title: Little Lemon app (Android)
portfolio.description: Created an android app in Kotlin using Jetpack Compose. After an onboarding screen, the app fetches a list of dishes from an API and organizes them into a local SQL database. The user can then filter and search said dishes.

portfolio.title: Food Waste Market
portfolio.description: Helped create an interactive food marketplace using modern frameworks and technologies (Vue.js, Flask, MongoDB). Businesses can donate the food that is about to be discarded. Through a map, charitable organizations can reserve the food and pick it up after-hours.
